FRIENDLY REMINDER

Winter averaging months are December, January, and February--we will take your consumption from these months and averaged them to determine your sewer rate for 2026. Remember, the less water you use, the lower your rate is.


FRIDAY, OCTOBER 3, 2025 FOOD BANK INITIAL DISTRIBUTION IS FROM 9:30 TO 10:30 OR WHEN ALL FOOD IS DISTRIBUTED

to submit a Texas Community Development Block Grant Program grant application for a Community Development Fund grant request of up to $500,000 for a sewer improvement project.

ONLINE BILL PAY!

The City of Poteet now offers the option to Register your Utility Account Online.

  • Make a Payment

  • Set up Paperless Billing

  • View Your Bill

  • See Your Usage History

  • Look at your Utility Account History

  • Sign up for Auto Pay

    Just Click the "Utility Bill Pay PIC" Option on the top left side of the screen or on the link: https://poteettx.merchanttransact.com/
